page.title: 13EDUCATION:HOME AND SCHOOL
page.content: When I wake up in the morning I get dressed and go downstairs to have my breakfast. After breakfastI pack my bag. I put in my shorts and tracksuit.I call for Nicholas at twenty five past eight and we walk to school. When we get to school we hang our coats up and go into the classroom and I talk to Antony about motorbikes till the bell goes. When the bell goes our names are called by the teacher so the teacher knows if we are all here. Next we go in the other room for assembley. We sing a hymn which is a song then the teacher tells us a story. After the story we say a prayer then we go back to the other room. For English we do S.R.A. cards. You have to read a story then answer some questions about the story. At twenty { to eleven we have play time .We play football and then we come in for maths
